|wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050;BCM2050KMLG, TS0717 P11, 819987; |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Anadigics;AWL6153;;1; |flags=high power |stock_boot=CFE;1.0.37-1.08;BCM947XX; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, Tomato, OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=000D0BXXXXXX,001601XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^000D0B[A-F0-9]{6}$,,,^001601[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui=00:0D:0B, 00:16:01 |oui_eth=00:0D:0B, 00:16:01 |default_ch= }} Multiple revisions? *"BCM5352-HP-EA" is silkscreened on the board in the TechInfoDepot pictures.
*"BCM5352-HP-DA" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. This device is using an [http://www.anadigics.com/products/view/awl6153 '''Anadigics''' AWL6153 Power Amplifier Module]. ==Additional external links== ===Wikis=== *{{TechInfoDepot|Buffalo_WHR-HP-G54}} (high res internal shots) *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/whr-hp-g54 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] **Like most low-spec b/g BCM47xx gear, using '''Backfire''' (10.03.1) would be recommended *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/WHR-HP-G54 On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki] ===Spec. sites=== *[http://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=458 On whirlpool.net.au] :If the Whirlpool data is accurate, the default SSID is the wireless interface MAC address. WiGLE data shows the '''XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX''' pattern described in the Whirlpool data to be somewhat less common than '''XXXXXXXXXXXX'''. ==Images== Image:Buffalo_WHR-HP-G54_board_top.jpg|board top Image:Buffalo_WHR-HP-G54_bt_BCM5352E.jpg|BCM5352E WiSoC Image:Buffalo_WHR-HP-G54_bt_Flash.jpg|Flash Image:Buffalo_WHR-HP-G54_bt_RF_section.jpg|RF section Image:Buffalo_WHR-HP-G54_bt_BCM2050.jpg|BCM2050 RFIC Image:Buffalo_WHR-HP-G54_bt_AWL6153.jpg|AWL6153 PA Image:Buffalo_WHR-HP-G54_bt_Eth_label.jpg|label on the Ethernet ports Image:Buffalo_WHR-HP-G54_bt_silkscreened_text.jpg|silkscreened text Image:Buffalo_WHR-HP-G54_bt_above_power_subsection.jpg|board top, above power Image:Buffalo_WHR-HP-G54_board_bottom.jpg|board bottom Image:Buffalo_WHR-HP-G54_bb_RAM_and_gen_area.jpg|RAM and general area [[Has images::internal| ]] ==Serial== ===Pinout=== 
(3.3) (GND) (TxD) (RxD)
